body: Your Inn is a beacon of safety and warmth, and the business you've been doing has earned you a growing reputation in the surrounding settlements. If you succeed at a DC 25 Diplomacy or Perform check, you steer the rumors favorably to increase business, and for 2d6 days, the building gains a +10 bonus on its first check to generate capital each day.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Downtime Events/Inn Events/Talk of the Town
name: Talk of the Town
